description: Retrieves information about the specified finding. GetFinding and GetFindingV2 both use access-analyzer:GetFinding in the Action element of an IAM policy statement. You must have permission to perform the access-analyzer:GetFinding action.

parameters.name: analyzerArn
parameters.description: The ARN of the analyzer that generated the finding.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the finding to retrieve.

nested_items.name: analyzedAt
nested_items.description: The time at which the resource-based policy or IAM entity that generated the finding was analyzed.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The time at which the finding was created.

nested_items.name: error
nested_items.description: An error.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The ID of the finding to retrieve.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: A token used for pagination of results returned.

nested_items.name: resource
nested_items.description: The resource that generated the finding.

nested_items.name: resourceType
nested_items.description: The type of the resource identified in the finding.

nested_items.name: resourceOwnerAccount
nested_items.description: Tye Amazon Web Services account ID that owns the resource.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the finding.

nested_items.name: updatedAt
nested_items.description: The time at which the finding was updated.

nested_items.name: findingDetails
nested_items.description: A localized message that explains the finding and provides guidance on how to address it.

nested_items.name: externalAccessDetails
nested_items.description: The details for an external access analyzer finding.

nested_items.name: action
nested_items.description: The action in the analyzed policy statement that an external principal has permission to use.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: condition
nested_items.description: The condition in the analyzed policy statement that resulted in an external access finding.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: isPublic
nested_items.description: Specifies whether the external access finding is public.

nested_items.name: principal
nested_items.description: The external principal that has access to a resource within the zone of trust.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: sources
nested_items.description: The sources of the external access finding. This indicates how the access that generated the finding is granted. It is populated for Amazon S3 bucket findings.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: Indicates the type of access that generated the finding.

nested_items.name: accessPointArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the access point that generated the finding. The ARN format depends on whether the ARN represents an access point or a multi-region access point.

nested_items.name: accessPointAccount
nested_items.description: The account of the cross-account access point that generated the finding.

nested_items.name: resourceControlPolicyRestriction
nested_items.description: The type of restriction applied to the finding by the resource owner with an Organizations resource control policy (RCP).

nested_items.name: unusedPermissionDetails
nested_items.description: The details for an unused access analyzer finding with an unused permission finding type.

nested_items.name: actions
nested_items.description: A list of unused actions for which the unused access finding was generated.

nested_items.name: action
nested_items.description: The action for which the unused access finding was generated.

nested_items.name: lastAccessed
nested_items.description: The time at which the action was last accessed.

nested_items.name: serviceNamespace
nested_items.description: The namespace of the Amazon Web Services service that contains the unused actions.

nested_items.name: lastAccessed
nested_items.description: The time at which the permission was last accessed.

nested_items.name: unusedIamUserAccessKeyDetails
nested_items.description: The details for an unused access analyzer finding with an unused IAM user access key finding type.

nested_items.name: accessKeyId
nested_items.description: The ID of the access key for which the unused access finding was generated.

nested_items.name: lastAccessed
nested_items.description: The time at which the access key was last accessed.

nested_items.name: unusedIamRoleDetails
nested_items.description: The details for an unused access analyzer finding with an unused IAM role finding type.

nested_items.name: lastAccessed
nested_items.description: The time at which the role was last accessed.

nested_items.name: unusedIamUserPasswordDetails
nested_items.description: The details for an unused access analyzer finding with an unused IAM user password finding type.

nested_items.name: lastAccessed
nested_items.description: The time at which the password was last accessed.

nested_items.name: findingType
nested_items.description: The type of the finding. For external access analyzers, the type is ExternalAccess. For unused access analyzers, the type can be UnusedIAMRole, UnusedIAMUserAccessKey, UnusedIAMUserPassword, or UnusedPermission.
